summary: This mod changes the parameters of several spells and game settings, in order to give players new levels of flexibility, freedom and power, and also to add many "quality of life" improvements to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#FAC108][b][size=5]Rezel Modified Spells and Settings[/size][/b][/color][/center]


This mod used to be part of my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41587/][color=#B9FA08][u]REZEL SORTING MOD[/u][/color][/url] as a mod called "Rez Spell Edit", but I decided that it would make more sense to have it as a standalone mod and I renamed it :P. It will start as v1.0 but it will include everything that was done previously.

________________________________________
[size=3][b][u][color=#EBE00E]M[/color][color=#CDDD0C]y[/color] [color=#92D808]M[/color][color=#75D607]o[/color][color=#58D305]d[/color][color=#3AD103]s[/color][color=#1DCE01]:[/color][/u][/b][/size]

> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41587//?][color=#a05ced]REZEL SORTING MOD[/color][/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44737//?][color=#a05ced]Rezel Modified Spells and Settings[/color][/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43113//?][color=#a05ced]No More Click-EY Clicks_AHK Script[/color][/url]
________________________________________

[line][center][b][size=5]
[color=#FA9108]D[/color][color=#FA9908]E[/color][color=#FAA208]S[/color][color=#FAAB08]C[/color][color=#FAB408]R[/color][color=#FABD08]I[/color][color=#FAC508]P[/color][color=#FACE08]T[/color][color=#FAD708]I[/color][color=#FAE008]O[/color][color=#FAE908]N[/color]
[/size][/b][/center]

Simply put, RMSS changes the parameters of several spells and game settings, in order to give players new levels of flexibility, freedom and power, and also to add many "quality of life" improvements to Skyrim.

[b][u]PS[/u][/b]: While many of the features are meant to provide better "QoL", some features can be overpowering and will most probably give players an unfair advantage.
[line]
[color=#00ff00][b][size=3]Mod Patches[/size][/b][/color]

These are the RMSS mod patches made so far:

- Immersive Weapons (arrows tweaked).
[line]
[color=#00ff00][b][size=3]Future Plans[/size][/b][/color]

My next project is to make an MCM menu for RMSS, so that players would be able to customize it as they see fit.
I am not sure when that will happen since I have to learn how to do that first :P, but it's something I would very much like to do.
[line][center][b][size=5]
[color=#FA9108]I[/color][color=#FA9908]N[/color][color=#FAA108]S[/color][color=#FAA908]T[/color][color=#FAB108]A[/color][color=#FAB908]L[/color][color=#FAC108]L[/color][color=#FAC908]A[/color][color=#FAD108]T[/color][color=#FAD908]I[/color][color=#FAE108]O[/color][color=#FAE908]N[/color]
[/size][/b][/center]

This mod features a FOMOD [u]installer[/u] for [size=3][b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b][/size].

[color=#08A9FA][b][u]Automatic[/u][/b][/color]: Install using Nexus Mod Manager.
[color=#08A9FA][b][u]Manual[/u][/b][/color]: Download and put the ".esp" file(s) in Skyrim\Data folder.

[color=#08A9FA][b][u]Update[/u][/b][/color] from a previous version of RMSS by uninstalling the old file(s) and reinstalling the new ".esp" file(s), either automatically in NMM or manually as described above.

[color=#08A9FA][b][u]Uninstall[/u][/b][/color] via Nexus Mod Manager or by deleting the ".esp" file(s) from Skyrim\Data folder.

[u]PS[/u]: This mod have no scripts whatsoever, so it can be safely installed, reinstalled, uninstalled and updated, with no effect on your saves.
[line]

[size=3][color=#40e0d0][u]LOAD ORDER[/u][/color][/size]

It is best to have this mod toward the end of your load order to override any other mods that may change the same spells or settings.
Load any RMSS Patches after the main RMSS Mod.

[color=#00ff00]Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
...
[b]RSM - Rez Sorting Mod[/b][/color] <-- if you use my sorting mod
[color=#00ff00][b]RSM Patches[/b][/color] <-- all RSM patches can come here in any order

[color=#00ff00][b]RMSS - Rez Modified Spells and Settings.esp
RMSS Patch (Immersive Weapons).esp
RMSS other Patches[/b][/color] <-- all future RMSS patches can come here in any order
[line][center][b][size=5]
[color=#FA9108]S[/color][color=#FA9508]P[/color][color=#FA9908]E[/color][color=#FA9D08]L[/color][color=#FAA108]L[/color][color=#FAA608] [/color][color=#FAAA08]&[/color][color=#FAAE08] [/color][color=#FAB208]S[/color][color=#FAB608]E[/color][color=#FABB08]T[/color][color=#FABF08]T[/color][color=#FAC308]I[/color][color=#FAC708]N[/color][color=#FACC08]G[/color][color=#FAD008] [/color][color=#FAD408]C[/color][color=#FAD808]H[/color][color=#FADC08]A[/color][color=#FAE108]N[/color][color=#FAE508]G[/color][color=#FAE908]E[/color][color=#FAED08]S[/color]
[/size][/b][/center]

This is a list of the changes that this mod does to spells and game settings, just to give you an idea. Check the details for more info:

[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Faster game Reload on death: [color=#08FA10]1.5s[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] More Summons: [color=#08FA10]10[/color] [color=#63c3f0]creatures at a time[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Better Pickpocketing: [color=#08FA10]20%[/color][color=#63c3f0] min & [/color][color=#08FA10]100%[/color][color=#63c3f0] max[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] More Skill Training per level with reduced Cost: [color=#08FA10]500[/color][color=#63c3f0] times per level[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] More and stronger Magelight & Candlelight spells: [color=#08FA10]50[/color][color=#63c3f0] ML Orbs at a time which last for[/color] [color=#08FA10]600s[/color]; [color=#63c3f0]CL lasts for [/color][color=#08FA10]300s[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] More and stronger spell Runes: [color=#08FA10]50[/color][color=#63c3f0] Runes at a time[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Lower Spell Charge time and Magicka Cost for some spells.
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Longer Spell Duration for some spells: [color=#63c3f0]Summon & Buff spells last[/color] [color=#08FA10]300s[/color][color=#63c3f0] to[/color] [color=#08FA10]600s[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Faster Projectile Speed for some Spells: [color=#63c3f0]"Firebolt"[/color], [color=#63c3f0]"Fireball"[/color], [color=#63c3f0]"Ice Spike"[/color] & [color=#63c3f0]"Ice Spear" are now more than[/color] [color=#08FA10]x3[/color][color=#63c3f0] times faster[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Faster Projectile Speed for ALL Arrows: [color=#08FA10]x2[/color][color=#63c3f0] times faster, lighter & hit at longer range[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Retrieve More Arrows from slain enemies: [color=#08FA10]90%[/color][color=#63c3f0] chance[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Faster Shouts for ALL shouts: [color=#63c3f0]Releasing a full 3-word shout is almost[/color] [color=#08FA10]instant[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Longer Shout duration for some shouts.
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Longer Potion duration for some potions: [color=#63c3f0]Crafting & Utility potions now last up to [/color][color=#08FA10]600s[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Higher damage from Stealth: [color=#63c3f0]Dagger, Bow & XBow damage from stealth increased[/color].
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Slightly faster 2H Weapons.
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Longer Swimming underwater.
[color=#08FA10]->[/color] Fast Travel timescale fix: [color=#63c3f0]Normalizes & slows down the time spent in Fast Travel, now @ factor of[/color] [color=#08FA10]4[/color].
[line][center][b][size=5]
[color=#FA9108]D[/color][color=#FA9E08]E[/color][color=#FAAB08]T[/color][color=#FAB808]A[/color][color=#FAC508]I[/color][color=#FAD208]L[/color][color=#FADF08]S[/color]
[/size][/b][/center]

>> [color=#40e0d0]MAGELIGHT - Foul darkness begone![/color]
You can have up to [color=#08FA10]50[/color] Magelight orbs active at once, up from 1.
[color=#FE2EC8]CK > Special Effect > Hazard > TestLightHazard > Limit = 50[/color]

>> [color=#40e0d0]Spell RUNES - Mine fields anyone?![/color]
You can have up to [color=#08FA10]50[/color] Runes active at once, up from 1.
[color=#FE2EC8]Menu > Gameplay > Settings > iMaxPlayerRunes > Value = 50[/color]
- Changed magnitude to 100, from 50.

>> [color=#40e0d0]SUMMONS - The more, the merrier![/color]
You can now have up to [color=#08FA10]10[/color] summoned creatures active at once, up from 1.
You can have multiples of the same creature too.
[color=#FE2EC8]Menu > Gameplay > Settings > iMaxSummonedCreatures > Value = 10[/color]

>> [color=#40e0d0]DEATH - Just a flesh wound![/color]
When you die, you almost instantly reload. Now set to [color=#08FA10]1.5s[/color], down from 5s.
[color=#FE2EC8]Menu > Gameplay > Settings > fPlayerDeathReloadTime > Value = 1.5[/color]
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0][b]SPELL Speed (Projectile):[/b][/color]

Increased the projectile speed of a few spells to make them more reliable at longer distances.

> [color=#80FF00][b]Firebolt[/b][/color] (FireboltProjectile01)
Speed: 8000, up from 2500

> [color=#80FF00][b]Firebolt[/b][/color] (FireboltExpertProjectile01)
Speed: 9000, up from 3200

> [color=#80FF00][b]Fireball[/b][/color] (FireBallProjectile01)
Speed: 8000, up from 2500

> [color=#80FF00][b]Ice Spike[/b][/color] (FrostIcicleProjectile01)
Speed: 8000, up from 2500

> [color=#80FF00][b]Ice Spear[/b][/color] (FrostIcicleProjectile02)
Speed: 8000, up from 2500

>> [color=#40e0d0]SPELL charge time[/color] is now at 0 for most of the below-listed spells.
>> [color=#40e0d0]SPELL Magicka cost[/color] is also massively reduced:

[list] [*] Rank I = 5 Magicka
[*] Rank II = 10 Magicka
[*] Rank III = 15 Magicka
[*] Rank IV = 20 Magicka
[*] Rank V = 25 Magicka
[/list]>> [color=#40e0d0]SPELL duration:[/color]

Increased the duration of many Summon and Buff spells (from Staves, Scrolls and Spells) to 300s or 600s, up from 60s for most spells.

Basically, I tried to add some "quality of life" improvements to several spells, at least the "Fire and Forget" ones, to reduce the amount of spell switching, which to be honest I find cumbersome in Skyrim :P.

> [color=#80FF00][b][Cloak III] Flame[/b][/color]
> [color=#80FF00][b] [Cloak III] Frost Cloak[/b][/color]
> [color=#80FF00][b][Cloak III] Lightning Cloak[/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins)
Magnitude: 20
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 15

> [color=#80FF00][b][Stealth II] Muffle[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: 2
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 10

> [color=#80FF00][b][Stealth IV] Invisibility[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: none
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 20

> [color=#80FF00][b][Light I] Candlelight[/b][/color]
Duration: 300s (5 mins)
Magnitude: 10
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 5

> [color=#80FF00][b][Light II] Magelight[/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins)
Magnitude: 50
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 10
Area: 100

> [color=#80FF00][b][Manipulate III] Waterbreathing[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: none
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 15

> [color=#80FF00][b][Protect I] Oakflesh[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: 40
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 5

> [color=#80FF00][b][Protect II] Stoneflesh[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: 60
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 10

> [color=#80FF00][b][Protect III] Ironflesh[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: 80
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 15

> [color=#80FF00][b][Protect IV] Ebonyflesh[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: 100
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 20

> [color=#80FF00][b][Protect V] Dragonhide[/b][/color]
Duration: 1 day
Magnitude: none
Charge Time: 0
Spell Cost: 25

> [color=#80FF00][b][Vision I] Clairvoyance[/b][/color]
Type: Fire and Forget, changed from: Concentration
Duration: 15s, up from 1s

PS: I changed "Clairvoyance" to give it better usability.

[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0][b]ARROW Speed (Projectile):[/b][/color]

Increased the projectile speed of all arrows to make them more reliable at longer distances.
Also, added the same changes to the arrows of "[color=lime]Immersive Weapons[/color]" mod, in the related patch.

> [color=#80FF00][b]All Arrows[/b][/color]
Speed: 6000, up from 3600.
Gravity: 0.25, down from 0.35.

> [color=#80FF00][b]Riekling Spear[/b][/color]
Speed: 5000, up from 2000.
Gravity: 0.5, down from 1.3.

>> [color=#40e0d0][b]More ARROWS:[/b][/color]

Retrieve more of your arrows and enjoy a bit more visual carnage ;D

> [color=#FE2EC8]iArrowInventoryChance[/color] = 90, up from 33(%).
The percent chance that an arrow which struck its target will be added to the target's inventory.

> [color=#FE2EC8]iMaxAttachedArrows[/color] = 5, up from 3.
The maximum number of arrows or other projectiles that can be stuck in a body.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fAttachedArrowAgeMax[/color] = 8.0000, down from 10.
Number of seconds that a stuck arrow will stay visible.

=====

For better archery aiming in Skyrim, I recommend adding/changing the following lines in your [color=lime]Skyrim.ini[/color] file (the one in your "My Games" folder). I use them myself to great effect. Go to your "/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/" directory, and add the lines as you see here.

[color=yellow]Note:[/color] If you don't have an [Actor] and/or [Combat] section(s) in your "Skirim.ini" file already, just create them toward the end of the file.
[size=3][color=red] PS: Make sure to backup "Skyrim.ini" first before any edits.[/color][/size]
[code][color=#63c3f0]
[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=14000.0000

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7[/color][/code]

[color=#63f0c1]fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist[/color]: This increases the distance that arrows can fly to eliminate disappearing arrows.

[color=#63f0c1]fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult[/color] & [color=#63f0c1]fMagnetismLookingMult[/color]: These control the aim-assist feature in Skyrim (i.e. Auto-Aim). Auto-Aim basically shifts arrows towards your enemies to help you hit them, if the arrow was close enough but was going to miss. Setting these to "0" disables Auto-Aim. If you like, you can keep Auto-Aim enabled by simply not adding these 2 lines.

[color=#63f0c1]f1PArrowTiltUpAngle[/color], [color=#63f0c1]f3PArrowTiltUpAngle[/color], [color=#63f0c1]f1PBoltTiltUpAngle[/color] and [color=#63f0c1]f3PBoltTiltUpAngle[/color]: These settings control where the aiming reticle/dot/crosshair is displayed on your UI. With "0.7" it should be at the center to help you aim and hit better. Even though gravity is reduced, it still exists; but arrows should fly a lot straighter now, reducing the need to arc your arrows higher in order to hit far-away targets. Lastly, in Skyrim, "f1" generally refers to 1st Person, while "f3" refers to 3rd Person, just fyi :P You can also experiment with changing those values till you get something you are comfy with!
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0][b]SHOUT Duration:[/b][/color]

Increased the duration of a few shouts to reduce the amount of shout switching.

> [color=#80FF00][b]Elemental Fury[/b][/color]
Duration: 300s (5 mins), up from 15s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Marked for Death[/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 60s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Aura Whisper[/b][/color]
Duration: 40/50/60s, up from: 10/20/30s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Become Ethereal[/b][/color]
Duration: 16/26/36s, up from: 8/13/18s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Slowtime[/b][/color]
Duration: 16/24/32s, up from: 8/12/16s


>> [color=#40e0d0]Faster SHOUTS:[/color]

Faster shouting means you don't have to hold down the key for a full shout.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fShoutTime1[/color] = 0.001000, down from 0.200000.
Minimum time in milliseconds you have to hold the shout key to shout 2 words.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fShoutTime2[/color] = 0.020000, down from 0.900000.
Minimum time in milliseconds you have to hold the shout key to shout 3 words.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0][b]POTION Duration:[/b][/color]

I increased the duration of a few potions, because I felt the default duration was too short and restrictive.
Both found/bought potions and alchemy-created ones are covered.

PS: For alchemy-created potions, this only applies to new potions, i.e. those created after installing this mod.
Previously created potions are NOT affected.


[b][u][color=#FFFF00]Found/Bought Potions:[/color][/u][/b]

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Enchanting [ I ] to [ IV ][/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 60s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Smithing [ I ] to [ IV ][/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 30s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Barter [ I ] to [ IV ][/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 30s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Persuasion [ I ] to [ IV ][/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 60s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Waterbreathing [ I ] to [ IV ][/b][/color]
Duration: 600s (10 mins), up from 15/30/45/60s

> [color=#80FF00][b]Potion - Waterwalking[/b][/color]
Duration: 120s (2 mins), up from 60s


[b][u][color=#FFFF00]Created Potions/Ingredients:[/color][/u][/b]

> [color=#80FF00][b]Enchanting:[/b][/color][b] 600s (10 mins), up from 30s[/b]
Ancestor Moth Wing
Blue Butterfly Wing
Chaurus Hunter Antennae
Hagraven Claw
Snowberries
Spriggan Sap

> [color=#80FF00][b]Smithing:[/b][/color][b] 600s (10 mins), up from 30s[/b]
Blisterwort
Glowing Mushroom
Sabre Cat Tooth
Spriggan Sap

> [color=#80FF00][b]Barter:[/b][/color][b] 600s (10 mins), up from 30s[/b]
Butterfly Wing
Dragon's Tongue
Hagraven Claw
Tundra Cotton

> [color=#80FF00][b]Waterbreathing:[/b][/color][b] 600s (10 mins), up from 5s/60s[/b]
Chicken's Egg
Hawk's Egg
Histcarp
Nordic Barnacle
Salmon Roe
[line]

[size=4][color=#ffd700][b]Other changes to Gameplay Settings:[/b][/color][/size]


>> [color=#40e0d0][b]SKILL Training:[/b][/color]

Now, you can train up to 500 times per level (overkill, I know :D), and the cost is also reduced.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fTrainingMultCost[/color] = 2, down from 10.
> [color=#FE2EC8]iTrainingNumAllowedPerLevel[/color] = 500, up from 5.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]PICKPOCKETING chance:[/color]

Better chance to pickpocket stuff. I hated having to reload continually!!

> [color=#FE2EC8]fPickPocketMinChance[/color] 20.0000, up from 0.
Minimum chance to successfully pickpocket an item.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fPickPocketMaxChance[/color] = 100.0000, up from 90.
Maximum chance to successfully pickpocket an item.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]TWO-HANDED weapons:[/color]

Faster swings for 2H weapons.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fWeaponTwoHandedAnimationSpeedMult[/color] = 1.800000, up from 1.5.
Multiplier for two-handed weapon animations. Higher numbers result in faster swings.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]STEALTH multipliers:[/color]

Stealth is more deadly, to your enemies, as it should be!

> [color=#FE2EC8]fCombatSneak1HDaggerMult[/color] = 10.0000, up from 3.
The critical damage multiplier caused by your dagger when used from Stealth.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fCombatSneakBowMult[/color] = 4.0000, up from 2.
The critical damage multiplier caused by your bow when used from Stealth.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fCombatSneakCrossbowMult[/color] = 4.0000, up from 2.
The critical damage multiplier caused by your xbow when used from Stealth.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]BREATH when swimming:[/color]

Sorry Argonians! Now everyone can swim underwater for longer.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fActorSwimBreathBase[/color] = 60.0000, up from 10.
Number of seconds (additive) an actor can be submerged before drowning.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fActorSwimBreathDamage[/color] = 0.0800, unchanged.
Percentage of health lost per second while drowning.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fActorSwimBreathMult[/color] = 0.6000, up from 0.2.
Number of minutes (additive) an actor can be submerged before drowning.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]FAST TRAVEL Timescale Fix:[/color]

This setting determines the game time elasped while Fast Traveling somewhere. At the default setting of 1, the elapsed time is high. A setting of 4 makes the elsapsed time lower, i.e. Fast Traveling to a place will roughly require as much time as running or riding to it.

> [color=#FE2EC8]fFastTravelSpeedMult[/color] = 4.0000, up from 1.
[line]

>> [color=#40e0d0]INVENTORY:[/color]

This setting determines, when in inventory, when the game prompts for a specific quantity via the slider.
You can change this if you like

> [color=#FE2EC8]iInventoryAskQuantityAt[/color] = 5, unchanged.

[line]
[center][size=5][color=#ff0000]-==== END OF FILE ====-[/color][/size][/center]
author: Rezel - aka Treplos

files.name: Rez Modified Spells and Settings v1_0
